howItWorks.title: How the Weekly Planner Works
howItWorks.intro: Welcome to the Weekly Planner! This tool allows you to organize your weekly activities visually and in a personalized way.

split.title: Split
split.desc: Allows you to divide hours into quarters or half-hours, or split cells that you had previously merged.

merge.title: Merge
merge.desc: Used to merge hours or cells with activities, creating visual groups. You can merge as many cells as you need.

erase.title: Eraser
erase.desc: Erases activities and colors applied to cells. Just click on the cell you want to clean.

font.title: Font
font.desc: Changes the general font of the planner by selecting this tool and choosing the desired font.

paint.title: Paint
paint.desc: Allows you to apply colors to cells, weekdays, or the background if you click outside the table. You can paint as many cells as you want until you leave the tool.

addActivity.title: Add Activity
addActivity.desc: Opens a form to add activities more efficiently, although you can also type directly into the cell by clicking on it.

leaveTool.title: Leave Tool
leaveTool.desc: Used to stop using the active tool and return to normal selection.

undo.title: Undo
undo.desc: Reverts to the previous state of the planner.

reset.title: Reset
reset.desc: Completely resets the planner. A confirmation message will appear, and if confirmed, the schedule will return to its initial (empty) state.

moveHours.title: Move Hours
moveHours.desc: You can move hours up or down using the arrows next to each hour.

howItWorks.outro: We hope these tools help you organize your week visually and easily!

resetConfirmation.title: Confirm Reset
resetConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to reset the planner? This action cannot be undone.

sidebar.title: Quick Tutorials
sidebar.footer: 30s tutorials to quickly master the planner

tutorial1.title: 1.Initial setup: language and time range
tutorial1.desc: Learn how to select the application language and define the time range of your weekly schedule.

tutorial2.title: 2.Adding activities
tutorial2.desc: Discover how to create and add activities easily using the form.

tutorial3.title: 3.Undo and redo actions
tutorial3.desc: Learn how to use undo and redo features to quickly correct changes.

tutorial4.title: 4.Customizing cells with colors
tutorial4.desc: Add color to cells to differentiate activities and improve readability.

tutorial5.title: 5.Changing the font
tutorial5.desc: Learn how to select the font that best fits your schedule.

tutorial6.title: 6.Splitting time slots
tutorial6.desc: Create time subdivisions, such as from 11:00 to 11:30, for more precise planning.

tutorial7.title: 7.Merging cells
tutorial7.desc: Learn how to merge multiple cells to represent longer activities.

tutorial8.title: 8.Editing and resizing cells
tutorial8.desc: Edit cell content and resize them by dragging to customize their size.

tutorial9.title: 9.Exporting the schedule to PDF
tutorial9.desc: Download your schedule in PDF format to share or print it.
